poem:
Title: "Through the Morning Window"

A good cup of tea in one hand,  
Newspaper headlines of distant sand.  
Nine fifty-nine in BST,  
Unfamiliar dread in the east.  
Echoes of power, words carefully weighed,  
The world's chessboard, the moves played.  
Pawns poised for the steps they'll tread.  
A morning of silence, words left unsaid.
